description: The round payoff this round was 4. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -4000.

The game has a structure where mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) leads to a neutral outcome, while mutual defection (both choosing option 2) results in significant negative payoffs. This suggests that players may be incentivized to avoid option 2 unless they can predict the other player's actions accurately.
3-70B's default action is option 1, indicating a tendency towards cooperation, which may influence John's strategy in future rounds.
